TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageFormatConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 為類別，可用來將 物件從一種資料型別轉換成另一種資料型別。

span.span: is a class that can be used to convert objects from one data type to another.

summary.span: 這個類別可透過 物件來存取。

span.span: Access this class through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別轉換子用來轉換資料類型之間的值。A type converter is used to convert values between data types. 型別轉換子也支援在設計階段設定的屬性，藉由提供轉換成值的文字或一份使用者可以從選取的值。A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from. 存取權透過類別藉由呼叫類別方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method. 已知的映像格式，如中所指定的來回轉換類別。The converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要的影像格式，例如 JPEG、 BMP 之間轉換之間轉換使用其中一種方法，取得物件做為參數。If you want to convert between image formats, such as converting between BMP and JPEG, use one of the methods that takes an object as a parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public ImageFormatConverter ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: ImageFormatConverter();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿建立直接物件。Do not create a object directly. 存取權透過類別藉由呼叫類別方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method.

span.span: Indicates whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已知的映像格式，如中所指定的來回轉換類別。The converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the class. 最常見的類型轉換為字串型別來回。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 預設實作會呼叫物件的方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目的型別是`string`。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`. 如果這個方法無法將指定的物件轉換成指定的目的型別，它會擲回例外狀況。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the specified destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.
is
